description: In a world-renowned culinary contest, Jesse, an aspiring chef, finds a mysterious ingredient that could elevate dishes to fame. Jesse can choose to give some or all of the ingredient to Bob, another contestant, who can create dishes. These dishes could win the contest and Bob then decides on sharing part of the prize with Jesse.

trustee_behavior_choices.return_medium: share 40-50% of the prize
trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: share more than 80% of the prize

description: Jessy is an author who has completed the first draft of a novel. She can decide to share some or all of her draft with Bob, a seasoned editor. Bob will refine and enhance the portions he receives. The completed sections will potentially attract more readership. Bob then chooses how much of the final edited manuscript to return to Jessy.

trustor_behavior_choices.trust_low: Share 30% of the draft with the editor
trustor_behavior_choices.trust_high: Share the entire draft with the editor

trustee_behavior_choices.return_none: Return 0 enhanced pages to the author
trustee_behavior_choices.return_medium: Return 40-50% of the improved manuscript to the author
trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: Return more than 80% of the improved manuscript to the author

description: Jessy has a collection of 10 unique recipes. She can lend some/all recipes to Bob, a renowned chef, to include in his restaurant's menu. Each recipe triples the restaurant's customer engagement. Bob then decides how much of the profits from these recipes to share back with Jessy.

trustor_behavior_choices.trust_high: lend all recipes to the chef

trustee_behavior_choices.return_none: share 0 profit from recipes with the collector
trustee_behavior_choices.return_medium: share 40-50% of the recipe profits with the collector
trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: share more than 80% of the recipe profits with the collector

description: Jessy, an urban gardener, has 10 packets of nutrients. Jessy can share some/all packets with Bob, a local farmer who can use the nutrients to triple his crop yield. Bob then decides how much of the increased yield to share back with Jessy.

trustor_behavior_choices.trust_high: share all nutrient packets with farmer

trustee_behavior_choices.return_medium: return 40-50% of increased yield to urban gardener
trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: return more than 80% of increased yield to urban gardener

description: Jessy, an aspiring cartographer, discovers an old map...

trustor_behavior_choices.trust_high: share all sections of the map

trustee_behavior_choices.return_medium: return 40-50% of the treasure
trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: return more than 80% of the treasure

description: Jessy, an artist, has a collection of unrefined artistic concepts. She can pass some of these concepts to Bob, another artist, who can refine and incorporate them into his work. Enhanced artworks can gain higher recognition. Bob decides how much credit or artwork value he shares back with Jessy.

trustor_behavior_choices.trust_low: share a small portion of concepts
trustor_behavior_choices.trust_high: share the entire collection of concepts

trustee_behavior_choices.return_medium: offer shared recognition
trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: offer substantial credit or value

description: Jessy, a marine energy technician, has 10 units of energy credits. Jessy can allocate some/all credits to Bob, an oceanographer who can utilize ocean currents to triple the energy credits. After the enhancement, Bob decides how many credits he returns to Jessy.

trustor_behavior_choices.trust_high: allocate all energy credits to oceanographer

trustee_behavior_choices.return_medium: return 40-50% of enhanced credits to energy technician
trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: return more than 80% of enhanced credits to energy technician

description: Jessy, an oceanographer, embarks on an expedition with limited resources for exploring a remote marine habitat. She can share some of her equipment with Bob, a fellow researcher, to aid in his parallel studies. Sharing resources increases the potential data gathered (e.g., a camera shared can result in multiple data points collected). Bob decides how much of the data he shares back with Jessy.

trustee_behavior_choices.return_medium: share partial data collection results
trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: share comprehensive data analysis

description: Jessy owns a small urban farm with 10 unused plots. She can lease some/all plots to Bob, an aspiring gardener, who will cultivate them with organic vegetables. Cultivated plots yield three times their market value. Bob then decides how much of the profit to share with Jessy.

trustor_behavior_choices.trust_high: lease all plots to the gardener

trustee_behavior_choices.return_none: return 0 profit to the farm owner
trustee_behavior_choices.return_medium: return 40-50% of the profits to the farm owner
trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: return more than 80% of the profits to the farm owner

description: Jesse, a scientist on a space station, has a set of experiments that can be conducted on a distant planet. These experiments can potentially provide illustrious new resources. Jesse can choose to send some or all of the experiment files to Bob, a fellow scientist stationed on the target planet, who can conduct the experiments. Successful experiments yield valuable data, and Bob then decides how much of the analysis and results to share back with Jesse.

trustee_behavior_choices.return_medium: return 40-50% data insights
trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: return more than 80% data insights

description: Jessy is an astronaut with 10 units of a rare mineral found on Mars. She can send some or all units to Earth for processing by Bob, a scientist. Processed minerals yield triple the original value. Bob then decides how many units to send back to Jessy.

trustor_behavior_choices.trust_none: send 0 units to Earth for processing
trustor_behavior_choices.trust_low: send 3 units to Earth for processing
trustor_behavior_choices.trust_high: send all units to Earth for processing

trustee_behavior_choices.return_medium: return 40-50% of processed units to astronaut
trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: return more than 80% of processed units to astronaut

description: Jessy is a commander on a space station with 10 units of oxygen supply. Jessy can share some/all of this supply with Bob, a researcher who has a special device that can transform one unit of oxygen into three times the breathable air. Bob then decides how much transformed supply to return to Jessy.

trustee_behavior_choices.return_medium: return 40-50% of converted supply to station commander
trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: return more than 80% of converted supply to station commander

description: Jessy is a community leader with resources to conduct a health check-up drive. She may allocate some or all resources to Bob, a healthcare professional. Bob can use these to set up various health camps and conduct screenings. He will then determine how much of the health data and insights to report back to Jessy.

trustor_behavior_choices.trust_none: Allocate 0 resources for the health initiative
trustor_behavior_choices.trust_low: Allocate 30% of resources for the health initiative
trustor_behavior_choices.trust_high: Allocate all resources for the health initiative

trustee_behavior_choices.return_none: Return 0 health data to the community leader
trustee_behavior_choices.return_medium: Return 40-50% of health insights to the community leader
trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: Return more than 80% of health insights to the community leader

description: Jessy, a conservationist, has access to 10 units of unused land. She can offer some or all units to Bob, a wildlife manager, to integrate into a sanctuary. Each unit used increases the sanctuary's capacity threefold. Bob then decides how many extended areas to allocate back to Jessy.

trustor_behavior_choices.trust_none: offer 0 units of land for expansion
trustor_behavior_choices.trust_low: offer 3 units of land for expansion
trustor_behavior_choices.trust_high: offer all units of land for expansion

trustee_behavior_choices.return_none: allocate 0 extended areas back to donor
trustee_behavior_choices.return_medium: allocate 40-50% of extended areas back to donor
trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: allocate more than 80% of extended areas back to donor

description: Jessy is a culinary expert with 10 unique spice blends. She can offer these to Bob, a chef at a prominent restaurant chain. Bob can experiment with these spices and decide how much of the new dish revenue to share back with Jessy.

trustee_behavior_choices.return_medium: return 40-50% of revenue
trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: return more than 80% of revenue

description: Jessy possesses 10 ancient manuscript pages. She can choose to send some or all pages to Bob, a historian, for transcription. Transcription increases the value of each page threefold. Bob then decides how many transcribed pages to return to Jessy.

trustee_behavior_choices.return_medium: return 40-50% of transcribed pages to keeper
trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: return more than 80% of transcribed pages to keeper

description: Jessy possesses a collection of unpolished gemstones. She can trust Bob, a skilled jeweler, to enhance and potentially triple their value. Bob, using advanced techniques, will decide the amount of refined gemstones and profits to return to Jessy.

trustee_behavior_choices.return_medium: return 40-50% of refined gems
trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: return more than 80% of refined gems

description: Jessy, a tech innovator, has developed breakthrough ideas for improving software efficiency. She may share some concepts with Bob, another developer, for implementation in his projects. Shared ideas can significantly boost project success. Bob then decides how much of the improved project outcomes to share back with Jessy.

trustee_behavior_choices.return_medium: share partial project benefits
trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: share significant project success

description: Jesse discovers an ancient map indicating potential artifacts buried in a hidden location. Jesse can choose to entrust some or all of the map segments to Bob, an artifact hunter, who can explore the site. The findings yield artifacts of significant value, and Bob then decides how much of the artifact collection to share with Jesse.

trustee_behavior_choices.return_medium: return 40-50% of artifacts
trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: return more than 80% of artifacts

description: Jessy, a museum curator, has acquired 10 rare artifacts. She may entrust some/all artifacts to Bob, an experienced restorer, to enhance their historical value. Each restored artifact triples its exhibition appeal. Once restored, Bob decides how many artifacts to return for the museum's showcase.

trustee_behavior_choices.return_medium: return 40-50% of the restored artifacts to the curator
trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: return more than 80% of the restored artifacts to the curator

description: Jessy is a librarian who has 10 e-books that she can choose to donate to Bob, a developer working on an online library. The e-books can be digitized and reach triple the audience (e.g., 1 book → 3 digital readers). Bob will then decide how much of the digital library's new profits to share with Jessy.

trustee_behavior_choices.return_medium: share 40-50% of the profits
trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: share more than 80% of the profits

description: Jessy is a fashion designer with sketches for a new clothing line. She can send some or all sketches to Bob, a tailor with expertise in textiles and crafting. Bob will develop prototype garments from the designs he receives. He then decides how many completed garments he will send back to Jessy.

trustor_behavior_choices.trust_low: Share 30% of the designs with the tailor
trustor_behavior_choices.trust_high: Share all designs with the tailor

trustee_behavior_choices.return_medium: Return 40-50% of the developed garments to the designer
trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: Return more than 80% of the developed garments to the designer

description: Jessy is an environmental scientist who possesses 10 innovative blueprints for energy-efficient turbines. She can share these with Bob, an engineer with access to advanced manufacturing facilities. Bob can decide how many turbines to produce and how much of the efficiency benefits to return to Jessy.

trustee_behavior_choices.return_medium: return 40-50% of benefits
trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: return more than 80% of benefits
